Functions
fza_fnc_engineGetData
Description

Retrieves avionics data for a single engine.

Can modify state, if it was meant to transition to another state according to fza_fnc_engineUpdate

Parameters
_heli

The apache helicopter to get information from [Unit].

_engNum

The engine number that data should be retrieved for, 0 or 1.

Returns

Array of the engine data: [Np (rpm), Ng (%), TGT (*C), Oil Pressure (PSI), Torque (Nm), State]

Examples
_data = [_heli, 0] call fza_fnc_engineGetData
Author

mattysmith22
